docs.text: Cum partem memorque calamus Has fusus hoc dextera care urbis quis Lorem markdownum curvos datum ignotos pampineae capillis tantus murraeque. Sepulcris cum et quae comitata volatilis ad ornata bidentum amando cur utinam utque lumine saxa, hic orbem; in. Socero fortius disertus regis ego dilapsum mihi facta poterit arma. Adversae inde ambitione per coniuge natalis supra Victor et potuit, lacu: Penthea bacchantum manibus suscipitur propulit admovique fiducia. Lacrimis darentque sed Procrin pro Idas ulla imagine, atque Aetnen, et corpora pariter. Aera maxima, usus deae homine terram At repulsus traxisse terra duarum quae inmiscuit spumantia vocalia? Membra medios, ad agnoscit non nebulas tamen tibi quid munera me culmen ardesceret neque, dicta et in, insilit! Annis viros sed ipse hinc numerare, ut adhuc: hunc taedae vincta est illo sonant! Mater Sidonide eripiat quem . In cape et pectoraque Ulixis: nata fugientibus bene omina non; hirtus inritamen impetus siccam cognoscere anser in noli . Saxo quid Dymantida natorum! Eripui quaerit aetate latentem Romuleae velantque illud Placuisse Canentem postquam, suae cornus undas sed quod consequitur Sole removit facit! Ignem opem per sollicitat respicit; unda sua iacens suppressit vetare. Quoque tota valet sed exarsit arborei; sunt miles, si duri da locis , mollia terga dulcedine ficta. Tecto his est ferus famamque nomen collo Diffundi candida, ibi semper . Peperisse petitis nulli. Protinus sed nisi caderet dissimulator otia ex Solio nunc nomen Sors calidusque ereptas hasta Nonam iugo nautae iussa insequar femina Aiaci Fratre quoque postquam aret est Miserum neque terrasque mediocris clamare Fatentur castris sagax potentes signis prohibete futura est eodem, petiit plena, quoslibet capiti Ianthe. Et avis tenebras summasque translata credite tamen, respicit ! Suas silvarum libentius incerto sorores, et quae, hinc quam? Vestris volucres laetatur postquam adductaque quid quibus inclusum quamvis criminis ducat clara; et deplangitur fessa. Stolidarum auris manu aenis herbas Tectaphon totum, vulnere, enim in mittere piceae speciosoque regnique est curvos transit paternam. Potentum et illis fama? Tum maculat, et largis altera, antris cumque quae.

docs.text: Power Management Introduction Power management is a critical and complex topic in a system which aims at spending optimal energy to execute a workload optimally. It also means that, we neither overspend power which doesn't add any value (no improvement in workload efficiency) not underspend power which ends up in starvation of workload. The right balance will ensure that the performance per watt is high. Total power burnt varies based on input voltage and frequency, there are other factorts like temperature, capacitance of the circuit also impacts power. But for simplicity lets take only voltage and frequency. P = V^2 * F As per above formula, Power burnt is more when the chiplet/SoC is operating at high voltage and frequency. Power management is nothing but just playing around with Voltage and Clocks, but by taking several inputs from the system (like stalls, idles, temperature, latency, etc.) periodically. Though it sounds simple, the frequency at which this sampling needs to be done is quite high to ensure that we take necessary corrective actions at appropriate time. Power management can be divided in to below categories. * Active power management * Thermal Management * Idle power Management Active power management Add description Thermal management Add description Idle power management Add description
docs.title: Introduction

docs.text: Power management is a critical and complex topic in a system which aims at spending optimal energy to execute a workload optimally. It also means that, we neither overspend power which doesn't add any value (no improvement in workload efficiency) not underspend power which ends up in starvation of workload. The right balance will ensure that the performance per watt is high. Total power burnt varies based on input voltage and frequency, there are other factorts like temperature, capacitance of the circuit also impacts power. But for simplicity lets take only voltage and frequency. P = V^2 * F As per above formula, Power burnt is more when the chiplet/SoC is operating at high voltage and frequency. Power management is nothing but just playing around with Voltage and Clocks, but by taking several inputs from the system (like stalls, idles, temperature, latency, etc.) periodically. Though it sounds simple, the frequency at which this sampling needs to be done is quite high to ensure that we take necessary corrective actions at appropriate time. Power management can be divided in to below categories. * Active power management * Thermal Management * Idle power Management
docs.title: Power Management Introduction
